title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘We are blessed’: My husband is inheriting a $1 million home. Should he put it in my name too?
items.description: “We do not live in a community-property state. We have one son who is now a young adult.”

items.title: More older people than children now need caregiving. Governments and employers need to step up.
items.description: “Caregiving is no longer a personal issue. It’s a national crisis.”

items.title: Merck dives into COPD treatments with $10 billion purchase of Verona Pharma
items.description: Verona Pharma’s stock soars toward a record after $10 billion buyout deal with Merck.

items.title: Microsoft’s stock gets an upgrade. Why these analysts say it’s underappreciated in AI.
items.description: The sustaining growth of the company’s AI revenue and cloud platform Azure are not fully priced into the stock, Oppenheimer analysts said.

items.title: This big-name adviser says avoiding crypto is now a more speculative investment move than buying it
items.description: Ric Edelman argues that the time to invest in cryptocurrencies is now, while 95% of the world is still asleep.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
